content.rendered:
Online doctors, virtual health & prescriptions in Canada

Skip the waiting room! Instantly connect with Canadian-licensed doctors for medical care from your phone, tablet or computer – any time, 24/7.

  • This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

Proudly featured in:

A hand picked network of doctors and specialists ready to help you.

Our physicians, nurse practitioners, and allied healthcare professionals are Canadian licensed and practice in their respective fields right here in Canada.

Meet our doctors

How it works

1

Describe your symptoms through our app

Open the app and click the “Get care” button. One of our healthcare providers will review your request and respond in minutes.

2

Chat with a doctor or nurse practitioner

Next, you’ll be connected to the healthcare provider. Consultations usually take place over text, but the doctor may request video, or audio chat if needed.

3

Get a diagnosis or prescription

Doctors and nurse practitioners can diagnose and provide prescriptions as necessary during your consultation.

Requesting a consultation on Maple is easy.

Get Started

See how it works

Instantly connect with Canadian doctors and nurse practitioners for online medical care from your phone, tablet or computer.

Learn more

Doctors can treat many conditions online

Our online physicians can treat many conditions, without you ever having to leave home.

Learn more

Doctors can treat many conditions online

Our online physicians can treat many conditions, without you ever having to leave home.

Learn more

Maple is safe and effective for common non-emergency issues. If you believe you are experiencing an emergency, please call 911 or proceed to your nearest emergency room.

Doctors can treat many common conditions online.

Our online physicians and specialists can treat many conditions, without you ever having to leave home.

Birth control pills
Erectile dysfunction
Acne
Urinary tract infections
Dermatology
Mental health therapy
Endocrinology
Naturopathy

Learn more View all specialties

Maple is safe and effective for common non-emergency issues. If you believe you are experiencing an emergency, please call 911 or proceed to your nearest emergency room.

Patients love
using Maple

Read our social media reviews, or download the app

  6K Ratings   2K Ratings

Simple pricing to fit your needs.

You can use Maple for a single visit, or purchase membership plans and credit packages for year-round care.

Do you qualify for fee coverage? Click here to learn more.

Pricing options

Why do I have to pay if I’m Canadian?

Get started today.

Maple revolves around your needs and schedule. Start enjoying on-demand healthcare that fits your life.

Register

acf.meta_description: Maple is an app for fast, convenient 24/7 access to Canadian-licensed doctors. We instantly connect you with a doctor, so you can feel better faster!
